ygData.subject: Re: Need some opinions n purachsing game
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There ... soon ... me ... Group members won t be a problem, heh, for the first 50 or so levels. =) I m planning on starting at the same time as my younger
ygData.messageBody:
--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, "John Russo
<john_russo2000@y...>" <john_russo2000@y...> wrote:
> I don't think that you would have to worry about looking odd.
There
> are plenty of newbies on even now. I am going to start up again
soon
> myself from about a six month break. I am lookinh forward to
> starting from level one again that was half the fun o the game to
me
> working my way up in levels :o) What server are you going to play
> on? I would recomend E'c as I played that one when I was a total
> newbie and found the people great and very helpfull.
>
> John Russo
>
>


Group members won't be a problem, heh, for the first 50 or so levels.
=) I'm planning on starting at the same time as my younger brother
(bloody fool will be starting his own job soon and pay his own game)
and we'll be grouping whenever we get off work. Possibly Monk/Shaman
tandem or Monk/Warrior.

I haven't decided which server yet though. I was on Povar before I
cancelled my account. Has there been any new servers in the past 2
years? Heh. I'll probably do some research and pick one of the
younger, less played servers (if there are any).

Yager
